pr_title: Apply tags from Correlation Context key/values to Spans

timeline.bodyText: Why do you still try to change this? You have the tracing context, and #extract is in your control already.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText: NULL_DEREFERENCE:  object returned by context.getTraceSegment() could be null and is dereferenced at line 91.
timeline.author: sonatype-lift

timeline.bodyText: Should be a part of BeforeTest
timeline.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: Also, should be clear after test.
replies.author: wu-sheng

timeline.author: wu-sheng
wu-sheng
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -310,5 +310,10 @@
          * Max value length of each element.
          */
         public static int VALUE_MAX_LENGTH = 128;
+
+        /**
+         * Extract tags from the correlation.
+         */
+        public static String INJECTION_TAGS = "";

timeline.bodyText: From my understanding, this should be in the static{} block, as it doesn't need to execute every time.
timeline.author: wu-sheng
